mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PW , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_TEL , USER_MOBILE , USER_REG_NUMB_1 , USER_REG_NUMB_2 , CONCAT( USER_REG_NUMB_1, '-', USER_REG_NUMB_2 ) AS USER_REG_NUMB , USER_JOIN_DATE , USER_SALES , USER_LEVEL , USER_APPR_YN , USER_YN , USER_LOGIN_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(USER_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_REG_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(USER_MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_MOD_DATE , USER_MOD_USER , COMP_CODE , COMP_TYPE , COMP_REG_NUMB_1 , COMP_REG_NUMB_2 , COMP_REG_NUMB_3 , CONCAT( COMP_REG_NUMB_1, '-', COMP_REG_NUMB_2, '-', COMP_REG_NUMB_3 ) AS COMP_REG_NUMB , COMP_NAME , COMP_BANKDA_PW , COMP_APPR_YN , COMP_EXP_DATE , IF(DCC.USER_ID IS NOT NULL, 'Y', 'N') AS CEO_YN FROM DF_USER_INFO DUI JOIN DF_COMP_INFO DCI USING (COMP_CODE) LEFT JOIN DF_COMP_CEO DCC USING (COMP_CODE, USER_ID) WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USER_PW = #{user_pw}
